channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- Retail Returns Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle Corporation -- Retail Returns Management

item.title: CVE-2018-2737|2024-08-05T04:29:44.106Z -- oracle%20corporation -- retail%20returns%20management
item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Retail Returns Management component of Oracle Retail Applications (subcomponent: Security). Supported versions that are affected are 2.3.8, 2.4.9, 14.0.4 and 14.1.3. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle Retail Returns Management. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized update, insert or delete access to some of Oracle Retail Returns Management accessible data as well as unauthorized read access to a subset of Oracle Retail Returns Management accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 6.5 (Confidentiality and Integrity impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:L/A:N).
